versionFeatures: [IMPROVEMENT] Improve loading speed of data at 'Number Pools' list.
[NEW FEATURE] Releas Notes section added to the Dashboard screen with link to the page with all previous release notes.
[FIX] Fix rendering process of the Event entry detail view, without having to renter the record.
[NEW FEATURE] Feature to allow QU4RTET users to more efficiently revert to the “Tasks List” view when they have entered Task Detail view, via use of a  “Back Arrow”.
[NEW FEATURE] Feature to remind QU4RTET users to adjust the time on their packaging lines to account for the Daylight Savings time adjustments in spring and autumn.
[IMPROVEMENT] Restriction of the capability for users with low level QU4RET access to edit the random Serial Number (SN) ranges.
[IMPROVEMENT] Animation while data is loading for “Tasks List” and “Number Pools”.
[IMPROVEMENT] A modern and unified application view with improved style settings.
[NEW FEATURE] Feature to calculate and show the user (in hours, minutes, seconds, and milliseconds) the time difference between steps in the Task Detail.
[IMPROVEMENT] Addition of a form for the creation of “List-Based regions” within the UI.
[NEW FEATURE] Functionality to allow the user to change the visibility of server names.
[FIX] Creating list-based region for Number Pool
[IMPROVEMENT] Add Release Notes button to the top navigation bar
[IMPROVEMENT] Add type of change for every row of release notes (FIX, IMPROVEMENT, NEW FEATURE)
Releas Notes section added to the Dashboard screen with link to the page with all previous release notes
Screen with all release notes was created
